text: Frederick Miller Cahoon (November 26, 1876 – September 13, 1945) was an American football, basketball, and baseball coach. He served as head coach in all three sports between 1913 and 1920 at Texas Christian University (TCU), where was also school's director of bands. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1945 deaths Category:TCU Horned Frogs baseball coaches Category:TCU Horned Frogs football coaches Category:TCU Horned Frogs men's basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Fred Cahoon
